NK001(ka)018:0: thub dbang gnas brtan 'khor bcas la phyag mchod bya
NK001(ka)018:1: tshul mdor bsdus pa yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po
NK001(ka)018:4: thub dbang gnas brtan bcu drug la phyag mchod gsol ba gdab par 'dod pas /
NK001(ka)018:5: 'byor na thub pa'i dbang po gtso 'khor gyi snang
NK001(ka)018:6: bsnyen mdun mchod pa ji ltar rigs pa gtsang zhing
NK001(ka)018:8: ma grub na yid kyi cho ga bya /
NK001(ka)018:10: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la //
NK001(ka)018:11: byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
NK001(ka)018:12: bdag gis sbyin sogs bgyis pa'i bsod nams kyis //
NK001(ka)018:13: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /
NK001(ka)018:14: lan gsum gyis skyabs sems bya /
NK001(ka)018:15: skyabs gnas dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang //
NK001(ka)018:16: rgyal ba sras bcas rnams kyi byin rlabs dang //
NK001(ka)018:17: tshogs gnyis mnga' thang chos dbyings dag stobs kyis //
NK001(ka)018:18: snod bcud bde can zhing gi bkod pa'i dbus //
NK001(ka)018:19: yid 'phrog nor bu'i gzhal med khang chen por //
NK001(ka)018:20: rin chen seng khri pad zla'i gdan mchog dang //
NK001(ka)018:21: dngos bshams gzungs rig mos stobs kyis sprul pa'i //
NK001(ka)018:22: mchod sprin rgya mtshos gang zhing spyod gyur cig /
NK001(ka)018:23: ces sa gzhi dang gnas yo byin gyis brlabs /
NK001(ka)018:25: lag mthil ltar mnyam rin chen gyis spras pa //
NK001(ka)018:26: ljon shing chu mtshos brgyan pa'i sa gzhi dbus //
NK001(ka)018:27: rin chen las grub gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa //
NK001(ka)018:28: 0d+ma nyi zlas brgyan pa'i gdan steng du //
NK001(ka)018:29: thugs rjes rtsod pa'i dus kyi gdul bya rnams //
NK001(ka)018:30: rnam grol lam la 'god mdzad 'gro ba'i mgon //
NK001(ka)018:31: thub pa mchog dang gnas brtan chen po rnams //
NK001(ka)018:32: 'khor dang bcas pa gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK001(ka)018:34: spro na gnas brtan phyag mchod tshigs bcad lhug gang rigs bya /
NK001(ka)018:36: thabs mkhas thugs rjes sh+aakya'i rigs su 'khrungs //
NK001(ka)018:37: gzhan gyis mi thub bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa //
NK001(ka)018:38: gser gyi lhun po lta bur brjid pa'i sku //
NK001(ka)018:39: sh+aakya'i rgyal po'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK001(ka)018:40: thub pas bka' bsgos bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin //
NK001(ka)018:41: yan lag 'byung dang ma pham nags na gnas //
NK001(ka)018:42: dus ldan rdo rje mo bu- bzang po dang //
NK001(ka)018:43: gser be'u b+ha ra d+h+aa dza gser can mchog /
NK001(ka)018:44: 'phags pa ba ku la dang sgra can 'dzin //
NK001(ka)018:45: lam phran b+ha ra d+h+aa dza bsod snyoms len //
NK001(ka)018:46: lam bstan klu'i sde sbed byed mi phyed pa //
NK001(ka)018:47: dge bsnyen d+harma t+aa dang rgyal chen bzhi //
NK001(ka)018:48: 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhabs kyi pad mo la //
NK001(ka)018:49: phyag 'tshal skyabs mchi snying nas gsol ba 'debs //
NK001(ka)018:50: sa gzhi spos chus byugs shing me tog bkram //
NK001(ka)018:51: ri rab gleng gzhi nyi zlas brgyan pa 'di //
NK001(ka)018:52: sangs rgyas zhing du dmigs te phul ba yis //
NK001(ka)018:53: 'gro kun rnam dag zhing la spyod par shog /
NK001(ka)018:54: dngos bshams gzungs rig mos stobs kyis sprul pa'i //
NK001(ka)018:55: mchod tshogs kun 'bul sdig ltung thams cad bshags //
NK001(ka)018:56: dge la yi rangs bskul zhing gsol ba 'debs //
NK001(ka)018:57: 'dis mtshon dge ba byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK001(ka)018:59: dge slong yin na skabs 'dir gso sbyongs byin rlabs dang /
NK001(ka)018:60: dus dran bsten pa sogs dgos pa yod na byas kyang legs /
NK001(ka)018:61: bcom ldan gdan 'dzoms chen po dgongs su gsol //
NK001(ka)018:62: thub dbang gnas brtan 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams kyi //
NK001(ka)018:63: mtshan mchog thos dang dran barjoda phyag mchod mthus //
NK001(ka)018:64: bdag cag la sogs sems can gang dang gang //
NK001(ka)018:65: gnas skabs mthar thug mi mthun phyogs kun zhi //
NK001(ka)018:66: bde skyid chos ldan dpal 'byor rab tu 'phel ///
NK001(ka)018:67: ga mchog dge ba'i bshes kyis rjes bzung nas //
NK001(ka)018:68: gsung gi bdud rtsis 'tsho bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK001(ka)018:69: tshul khrims dag cing thos bsam sgom par ldan //
NK001(ka)018:70: nges par 'byung dang byang chub sems gnyis 'byongs //
NK001(ka)018:71: rtag tu gzhan phan spyod la mi g.yel bas //
NK001(ka)018:72: ma mkhyen go 'phang thob par byin gyis rlobs //
NK001(ka)018:73: rgyal bstan dri med phyogs bcur dar zhing rgyas //
NK001(ka)018:74: bstan 'dzin mchog rnams zhabs pad bskal brgyar bstan //
NK001(ka)018:75: 'jig rten dge legs chen pos khyab pa dang //
NK001(ka)018:76: don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'i bkra shis shog /
NK001(ka)018:77: ces gsol ba gdab cing bkra shis pa'i tshig gis mtha' brgyan par bya'o //
NK001(ka)018:78: zhes pa pa'ng dang pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi
NK001(ka)018:79: ched du bya bral ba 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang
NK001(ka)018:80: pos gsol ba btab pa de de bzhin du 'grub
